Text: Small correction: It's not a 2-disc edition. The original film is divided into two parts. It's Dersu Uzala (2 parts) on DVD-9 (Artificial Eye release 2011).

Note: The seeding speed up the more downloader/seeders there are. As long as I'm the initial seeder I'm using super-seeding mode.
